BiddingProcess.Question: How do I place a bid?
BiddingProcess.Answer: Simply register an account, log in, go to the product detail page, and enter your bid amount.

BiddingProcess.Question: Can I cancel a bid after placing it?
BiddingProcess.Answer: No, all bids are final and binding once submitted.

BiddingProcess.Question: How will I know if I win an auction?
BiddingProcess.Answer: You will receive an email and a notification on your dashboard if you are the highest bidder when the auction ends.

AccountAndSecurity.Question: How can I reset my password?
AccountAndSecurity.Answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions. You can also go to your profile > Security Management to update your password.

AccountAndSecurity.Question: Is my payment information secure?
AccountAndSecurity.Answer: Yes, all transactions are encrypted and processed through secure third-party payment providers.

SellingItems.Question: Can I sell my items on this platform?
SellingItems.Answer: Yes, registered users can apply to become a seller by submitting an application on their dashboard.

SellingItems.Question: Are there any fees for selling?
SellingItems.Answer: We charge a small rate on each successful sale. Details are available on our seller policy page.

Payments.Question: When do I have to pay for an item I win?
Payments.Answer: You must complete the payment within 48 hours after winning the auction.

ShippingAndDelivery.Question: Who handles shipping?
ShippingAndDelivery.Answer: Shipping is handled either by the seller or our trusted delivery partners. Details are provided in the auction listing.

ShippingAndDelivery.Question: How long does shipping take?
ShippingAndDelivery.Answer: Shipping time depends on your location and the seller’s processing time, usually between 3–10 business days.
